items.title: The Trump Administration Just Relaxed Nuclear Safety Rules as Money Pours Into the Industry
items.description: The changes are akin to ‘taking a wrecking ball’ to safety and security regulations, an expert told NPR.

items.title: 31 Million Americans Use GLP‑1s but New Claims Suggest Patients Aren’t Being Warned About Serious Risks
items.description: Patients know about nausea and vomiting. Now, lawsuits are raising concerns about vision loss.

items.title: 2 of Elon Musk’s Companies Could Be Merging Ahead of $1.5 Trillion IPO
items.description: It’s another move to gain an edge in the AI race.

items.title: Hims’ Super Bowl Ad Cost $16 Million and Nearly a Year’s Worth of Burnout
items.description: Co-founder Andrew Dudum shares his approach to the biggest (and most expensive) marketing moment of the year.

items.title: Undoing DOGE: Inside the Ambitious Plan to Clean Up the Damage
items.description: A group of former government workers are developing a day-one plan for the next administration.
